description:
Bibarel resembles a beaver. It moves sluggishly out of water, but once it is submerged, it can swim faster than a Feebas. It is an industrious worker that builds dams in streams with bark and mud. The male`s light area on his face is shaped more like a bone. It is the only Pok√©mon that is both Water and Normal type(s).
A Bibarel named Bob (Bob-arel) is featured on the TV series Boston Baked. Often the negative type and is very sensitive. Bob shows many anthromorphic feats such as walking upright and human conversation.
Bibarel first appeared in the anime in "Bibarel Knaws Best" where it was helping to make a bridge complete. Paul`s older brother Reggie also has one which Ash`s Turtwig defeated in a battle.
name: Beadull
